resources.string: You are in an area with a high risk of frostbite. Only go out if extremely necessary.
Beware of the rain, take an umbrella !
You don\'t have enough clothes, add at least 10!
"You haven't added enough clothes that would go well with this garment, add more : "
Touch me if it\'s not the right color!
a t-shirt/tank top with shorts, or ultra-light pants.
a t-shirt, with classic pants or why not shorts.
a long-sleeved top with a sweater. You may also need a vest.
a long-sleeved top with a big sweater or a warm enough coat. Consider gloves/beanie!
Once your clothes have been added, we will make recommendations!
Add three tops and three pants for:
"Swapparel was created to improve your self-confidence by making you ultra-fashion every day. If you think the application is useful, talk to your friends and family about it! "
Take a picture of the garment!
You didn\'t choose the corresponding weather!
It\'s going to be less than 0°C
a sweater and a very big coat, with scarf, hat, gloves, the whole thing!
and it rains in a few hours
but it rains in a few hours
and it\'s snowing in a few hours
but it\'s going to snow in a few hours
Start adding your clothes so we can help you.
The more you add your clothes, the better Swapparel gets and offers you better choices! Add
Are you sure you want to remove this garment?
Be sure of what you want and be sure of yourself. Fashion is not only about beauty, it is also about the right attitude. You have to believe in yourself and be strong.
We\'re looking for a network, are you connected to the Internet?
Touch the garment to detect its color!
Hey! You haven\'t seen how we recommend a style based on the weather yet! Complete this goal so that we can show you!
Validating your outfit every morning helps us to improve our choices!

By switching to Swapparel Pro, you can add your shoes to your looks, use the color matching engine to wear them with your looks, you remove ads, but most importantly, you allow me to continue to develop Swapparel !
(for the price of a metro ticket:)) )
You must have purchased the pro version to add shoes. Sorry! Go to the main menu to switch to the pro version!
Take a picture of your shoes!
Thank you for supporting Swapparel! New features are coming very quickly!
Touch the shoe to detect its color!
What are we going to add?
The application is not very well rated on the PlayStore, if you could give it a good rating, I would really appreciate it!
Language selection is now automatic at first launch.
New design for the Info/Settings page.
New design for the Intro page at first launch.
New design for the Clothes page when empty.
Removed the annoying banner on the Clothes List page.
Fixed incorrect sizing on the Individual Clothing page.
Fixed incorrect sizing on Pro page.
